Text: oh please seed - i've discovered my 1st ed rulebook is missing pages and i've got people who want to play!

I started 40k in 2nd edition and hadn't read any of the Rogue Trader stuff. This torrent has 7 pdf files, which are a fantastic look into the origin of the game. There is a hell of a lot of the best fluff that games workshop produced in here. This is certainly worth a download even if you started 40k in later editions. Thank you very much to the uploader, mimir01.
sorry, I should have said 14 pdf's. 7 from 1st edition and 7 from 2nd edition.
